## Task 3

```{r constructor}
myclass <- function(x){
  stopifnot(length(x) == 4, "incorrect length")
  structure(x, class = "myarray")
}
```

```{r validator}
mycheck <- function(x){
  stopifnot(is.integer(x)==1, "input is not integer")
  stopifnot(sum(x)>0, "sum is too small")
  return ("all good")
}
```

```{r helper}
myhelper <- function(x){
  if(length(x)==4 || mycheck(x) == "all good"){
    mynewclass <- myclass(x)
  }
  else{
    newx <- abs(round(x[1:4], 0))
    mynewclass <- myclass(newx)
  return (mynewclass)
  }
}
```

```{r examples}
myclass(1:4)
mycheck(1.1,1.2,1.3,2)
myhelper(1.1,1.2,1.3,2)
myhelper(1:4)
```
